title: Mods? Are you ok?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/6KvLqOa.png

https://i.imgur.com/WHdAzRm.png

Two of my posts were removed for "harassment", even though i was just giving advice to  a guy who was asking how to climb out of silver.

I told him to "Actually use your brain" & "get better and stop trolling"

Somehow that is considered harassment
 
 ==============================

edit;

When i said "Acutally use your brain" I was referring to not playing on auto pilot, 
I was not calling him whatever these mods think i said

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hI-fV-jOxxo


it is extremely depressing when the mods on these boards jump on every word you say and take it out of context.

> Do not post anything intended to insult

Not
